caption:
This photograph captures a vivid and cozy indoor scene featuring a man and a woman in a living room setting. The man, seated to the right, holds an acoustic guitar and is presumably playing it, gazing downwards at the instrument with expression of concentration. He wears glasses, a short-sleeved shirt, and pants. The woman, seated to the left on a floral patterned couch, appears relaxed and is listening intently to the music, with a slight smile on her face. She wears a short-sleeved, dark striped shirt and dark pants.

Both individuals are seated against a backdrop that includes patterned drapes and a partial view of a brick wall to the right. The muted lighting of the room suggests an evening setting, enhancing the intimate atmosphere. On the couch rests a decorative plush doll, and in front of the couch is a small coffee table with multiple dishes on it, suggesting they might have been having a meal or snacks during this musical session.

The photograph portrays a warm, personal moment, with a focus on leisure, music, and companionship in a home environment.
title: Hershal and mai Shrewsbury live just outside of a coalmining area near Beckley, West Virginia.  He works as an office of economic opportunity supervisor in Raleigh county.  She is active in helping with community health services.  He has only one leg, so he was never employed as a miner
